      void addTimeCredit(int timeCredit) 
      int computePrice(int duration, Bike bike)
      We compute the price according to the ride duration : if consuming time credit makes the ride cheaper, then it is used; Otherwise, wasting the time credit would be totally useless.

      • computePrice

        public int computePrice(int duration,
                        Bike bike)
        We compute the price according to the ride duration : if consuming time credit makes the ride cheaper, then it is used; Otherwise, wasting the time credit would be totally useless.
        Specified by:
        computePrice in interface Card
        Parameters:
        duration - duration of the ride has been computed and sent for computing the price
        the - type of the bike has the impact over the price of the ride
        Returns:
        the price is returned
